    Class Description
    Book
    Book class that represents a book object
    BookDAO
    Data Access Object for Book
    BookDAOInterface
    Interface for the BookDAO class
    BookMessage
    Message containing a book.
    BooksListMessage
    Message containing a list of books.
    Client  
    ClientController
    The ClientController class is responsible for handling the communication between the client and the server.
    ClientControllerInterface
    Interface for the client controller.
    ClientHandler
    Class that handles the client requests.
    CLIUtils  
    ConfigLoader
    Utility class to load configuration from a properties file
    Customer
    Customer class that represents a customer object
    CustomerDAO
    Customer Data Access Object
    CustomerDAOInterface
    Interface for the CustomerDAO class
    CustomerMessage  
    CustomersListMessage
    Message to send a list of customers
    DatabaseController
    This class is responsible for handling the connection to the database
    EmailNotificationService
    Service to send email notifications to customers
    GenericMessage
    Generic message class
    Genre  
    LendMessage
    Message for lending operations
    Lends
    Represents a lend of a book to a customer
    LendsDAO
    Data Access Object for Lends
    LendsDAOInterface
    Interface for the LendsDAO class
    LendsListMessage
    Message class for sending a list of Lends objects.
    LibraryApplication  
    Message  
    MessageFactory  
    NetworkInterface
    NetworkInterface class that is used to send and receive objects over a network connection.
    NIInterface  
    NotificationScheduler
    Class to schedule the email notification service

    Server  
    ViewController
    The ViewController class is responsible for handling the GUI of the application.
    VirtualLend
    Class to represent a virtual lend
